rows.label: bf11240100_0010
rows.name:
Your situation doesn't look good.
Baltrich is not going to let it go.

rows.label: bf11240100_0020
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf11240100_0030
rows.name: And you can't hide behind the Pope forever...

rows.label: bf11240100_0040
rows.name: That has nothing to do with you.

rows.label: bf11240100_0050
rows.name: If that were true, you wouldn't be here.

rows.label: bf11240100_0060
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf11240100_0070
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Hehehehe...

rows.label: bf11240100_0080
rows.name: Here.

rows.label: bf11240100_0090
rows.name: What is this place?

rows.label: bf11240100_0100
rows.name: It's a very tasty secret...

rows.label: bf11240100_0110
rows.name: Formerly known only to the Pope and me.

rows.label: bf11240100_0120
rows.name:
The essence of our Judician forbears,
originally salvaged from the bottom of the Cloud Sea.

rows.label: bf11240100_0130
rows.name: Some of it may hail from the fabled Land of Mors...

rows.label: bf11240100_0140
rows.name: Mors?

rows.label: bf11240100_0150
rows.name: Look.

rows.label: bf11240100_0160
rows.name:
This here display is a diagram of what
human cells are made of.

rows.label: bf11240100_0170
rows.name: And then this one here is a Blade's.

rows.label: bf11240100_0180
rows.name: Astonishingly alike.

rows.label: bf11240100_0190
rows.name:
Of course. After all, they are descended from humans too.
That in and of itself isn't too shocking.

rows.label: bf11240100_0200
rows.name: But this...

rows.label: bf11240100_0210
rows.name: It's the same, isn't it?

rows.label: bf11240100_0220
rows.name: Just wait...

rows.label: bf11240100_0230
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]adlib astonishd gasp

rows.label: bf11240100_0240
rows.name: That...that's a Core Crystal.

rows.label: bf11240100_0250
rows.name:
Exactly. A Blade's Core Crystal contains
information not only pertaining to humans...

rows.label: bf11240100_0260
rows.name:
It also records schematics describing
all manner of animal tissues.

rows.label: bf11240100_0270
rows.name:
You're saying Blades contain detailed
information of all living creatures?

rows.label: bf11240100_0280
rows.name: Not just that.

rows.label: bf11240100_0290
rows.name: Have a look at this undeveloped part.

rows.label: bf11240100_0300
rows.name: That is from a Divine Beast.

rows.label: bf11240100_0310
rows.name:
It suggests that this particular piece
may one day develop into a Divine Beast.

rows.label: bf11240100_0320
rows.name:
Isn't it mind-boggling?
A message from God, no doubt.

rows.label: bf11240100_0330
rows.name: From...God...

rows.label: bf11240100_0340
rows.name:
Indeed.
This is just what you were after.

rows.label: bf11240100_0350
rows.name:
I wish to investigate this, and learn more
of what the God has in store for this world.

rows.label: bf11240100_0360
rows.name: And, perhaps, claim this knowledge for our own.

rows.label: bf11240100_0370
rows.name: Including the Pope?

rows.label: bf11240100_0380
rows.name: Perhaps...

rows.label: bf11240100_0390
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf11240100_0400
rows.name: Isn't this in line with your own goals?

rows.label: bf11240100_0410
rows.name: Well then, I may as well help out.
